results.name: Get Down (The Vet Abdullah Games Dev)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
